BTW how do you guys feel about learning
* Concussive Strike // Active // Spend PP to make an attack that deals increased damage and can knock targets back a significant distance. Required for: "Overpower", "Charge", "Whirlwind Attack".
We should learn Charge too soon after, to compliment
* Power Charge [[ Granted by: pegasus gilded cuirass ]]: Charging attacks will resist interruption and behave as if you are heavier.
We don't have a skill that spends PP so it's just sitting there. And should be a nice addition to our damage letting us kill shit faster. And moving around enemies to position ourselves better, by knocking them away from allies or just away from us.
